data.title: Contact by calling 211 or (877) 541-7905
data.meta_description: For information about services in your area dial 2-1-1 or call (877) 541-7905. You may also search our 2-1-1 Texas Resources.
data.meta_site_name: 2-1-1 Texas | 2-1-1 Texas - Connecting People and Services
data.text:
Contact 2-1-1

For information about services in your area, dial 2-1-1 or (877) 541-7905, select your language, then choose Option 1

For information about state benefits (YourTexasBenefits.com) dial 2-1-1, select your language, then choose Option 2 To report waste, fraud and abuse (Office of the Inspector General) dial 2-1-1, select your language, then choose Option 3 To register for the State of Texas Emergency Assistance Registry (STEAR), dial 2-1-1, select your language, then choose Option 4 For information about mental health and substance abuse resources in your area, dial 2-1-1 or (877) 541-7905, select your language, then choose Option 5

If you have health and human services related complaints or issues, please visit the Office of the Ombudsman website If you are a service provider and would like to be listed in our 2-1-1 database, please contact your local Area Information Center. Click here for details.

If you have any questions regarding the website, please contact us at 211@hhsc.state.tx.us
